CatDescriptText: Reverend J. A. Arrington, pastor in Church of God In Christ denomination, 13 Buffington Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1957, pg.3 with question: "Do you think Pennsylvania's 'blue laws' against 'unnecessary' Sunday sales should be enforced?" Answer reads: "I think that they should be enforced. Six days thou shall do thy work and the seventh day thou shall do no work therein."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Reverend J. A. Arrington, wearing fedora, dot patterned necktie with clip, and dark coat, standing in front of light colored marble pillar between store windows, one on left with lamps, and one on right with jewely
